dmca.title: AudioVisual Sports Spanish Primera Divison A/V Infringment NRID13702

NRID13702

designates 217.204.130.186 as permitted sender)
client-ip=217.204.130.186; envelope-from=TimC@nr-online.com;
helo=nr-online.com; 
Message-ID: <EXCHFRONT02TP47BolV000051bb@smtp02.theplanet.com> 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 06 Mar 2007 14:21:36.0729 (UTC)
FILETIME=[BFC6D490:01C75FFA] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Sirs, 
 
 
AudioVisual Sport has the exclusive right to commercially exploit all
matches within the Primera Division, otherwise known as La Liga,
including, but not limited to, all moving images and other audio/video
content.  
 
We have noticed that your Web Site
http://calciofreestyle.forumcommunity.net is displaying and/or offering
La Liga audio visual content. 
 
As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from AudioVisual
Sport to use this content, your present use is an infringement of
AudioVisual Sport's rights.  
 
Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your
web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so. 
 
Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute
an express or implied waiver of any of AudioVisual Sport's rights or
remedies, including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement
not explicitly stated, whether current or in the future, all of which
are expressly reserved. 
 
 
 
Formal Declaration 
 
I hereby state that AudioVisual Sport is the owner of the exclusive
rights referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its
behalf with respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of
AudioVisual Sport I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that
use of the content in the manner complained of is not authorised by
AudioVisual Sport, its agents, or the law. 
 
I, Tim Cooper, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate. 
 
 
Yours sincerely, 
 
Tim Cooper 
 
 
NetResult 
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd 
Mulberry House 
583 Fulham Road 
London 
UK SW6 5UA 
Tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1730
